page.title: 15Ashford Cinema
page.content: The cinema is a place to watch films and enjoy yourself. It is used by people who wish to pay to see the latest films unavailable for use in the home, on television or video. The building is large and dirty. Inside it is big with two floors with rooms for two different films to be shown. There is a sweet shop. One girl of 11 reported that she had been there twice to see "BMX Bandits" and "Ghostbusters" both of which were worth going to see. She would like to see "Never Ending Story". Fewer people go to the cinema these days for many can hire older films for use with their home video. This enables films to be viewed at home,. on the television.
